description:
A fighting force organized by the http://anidb.net/ch1753 [Ronah family] in U.C. 0106, drawing on the skilled personnel of the http://anidb.net/ch1751 [Buch Concern] and its vocational training school. This private army is meant to serve as an advance guard, or vanguard, for the nation of http://anidb.net/ch1752 [Cosmo Babylonia]. Originally founded by Meitzer Ronah, the Crossbone Vanguard is eventually placed under the command of the mysterious Iron Mask.
After years of preparation, the Crossbone Vanguard enters combat with an assault on the space colony Frontier I in U.C. 0123. This highly motivated elite force far surpasses the Earth Federation Forces in terms of training and tactical skill, and its advanced mobile suits also outperform the Federation`s antiquated machines.
name: Crossbone Vanguard
